entry.title: Understanding Fast-Paxos
entry.summary: Fast-Paxos is an optimization for the Paxos consensus protocol, Fast-Paxos eliminates one one-way delay by using larger quorum. Lamport explains Fast Paxos as an important building block for Generalized Paxos. Further, many advances consensus (or replication) protocols extend the idea of Fast Paxos to build leaderless consensus protocol, such as EPaxos. In this article, I will explain how Fas...
